snippet: The online photography project “Humans of New York” aims to tell the story of the city’s residents. One particular string of photos, however, featuring a young student and a principal from Brooklyn, made it all the way to the White House.
abstract: The online photography project “Humans of New York” aims to tell the story of the city’s residents. One particular string of photos, however, featuring a young student and a principal from Brooklyn, made it all the way to the White House.

headline.main: A Student and a Principal Pay a Visit to the White House
